mapper.insert: INSERT INTO machine_set_count(user_id, date, machine_id, machine_count, sets) VALUES(#{userId},#{date},#{machineId},#{machineCount},#{sets})
mapper.update: UPDATE machine_set_count SET user_id = #{userId}, date = #{date}, machine_id = #{machineId}, machine_count = #{machineCount}, sets = #{sets} WHERE id = #{date}
